posts.post_content: A perfectly solid black beatstick with a cool picture. There isn't a whole lot to say about this, for a 4-drop, it kills a lot of creatures blocked or unblocked. Its just too bad its a legend. To be honest, I expected more from "the Extinguisher".. figured it would be more of a Timmy-esque creature.

Posted By: PhagePoker (11/5/2009 2:15:40 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content: Most everyone is talking about how it has to damage opponents life points, but so what? Whispersilk cloak anyone? On turn 3 play the cloak, turn 4 play ashling, turn 5 when you can attack with her equip her with the cloak. If you have mana accel that might be all one turn. I also really like the idea of using gorgon flail, you can use soul's fire on her (yay for fire elemental theme) to kill a creature off with her immediately with the gorgon flail attached, then swing in, either killing or forcing a sacrifice on yet another creature. Shes very awesome for creature removal.
posts.html:
